text: Paripoornanand Painulihttp://loksabhaph.nic.in/writereaddata/biodata_1_12/2174.htmhttps://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/dehradun/noted- freedom-fighter-and-ex-mp-paripoornanand-painuli-dies- at-94/articleshow/68868659.cmshttps://www.nationalheraldindia.com/obituary/paripoornananda- painuli-a-freedom-fighter-journalist-and-social-workerhttps://www.business- standard.com/article/news-ians/freedom-fighter-painuli-passes-away- at-94-119041300803_1.html (19 November 1924 – 13 April 2019) was an Indian politician and a member of the 5th Lok Sabha. He represented the Tehri Garhwal Lok Sabha Constituency and was a member of the Congress political party. ==Position Held== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year ! Description |- | 1971 | Elected to 8th Lok Sabha |- |} ==References== Category:1924 births Category:Indian National Congress politicians from Uttar Pradesh Category:People from Dehradun district Category:5th Lok Sabha members Category:Lok Sabha members from Uttar Pradesh Category:2019 deaths
title: Paripoornanand Painuli
